original_text: And he left Zadok the priest and his brothers the priests before the tabernacle of the Lord in the high place that was at Gibeon
korean_text: 제사장 사독과 그의 형제 제사장들에게 기브온 산당에서 여호와의 성막 앞에 모시게 하여

sentences.original_text: And he left Zadok the priest and his brothers the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 제사장 사독과 그의 형제 제사장들을 남겨두었으니

sentences.original_text: before the tabernacle of the Lord
in the high place that was at Gibeon
